carbon.description: an amount of carbon emitted into the atmosphere

disk-io.description: refers to GB of data written/read from disk

duration.description: refers to the duration of the input

energy.description: amount of energy utilised by the component

energy-cpu.description: Energy consumed by the CPU of the component

expected-lifespan.description: Total Expected Lifespan of the Component in Seconds

energy-memory.description: Energy consumed by the Memory of the component

energy-network.description: Energy consumed by the Network of the component

functional-unit.description: the name of the functional unit in which the final SCI value should be expressed, e.g. requests, users

functional-unit-time.description: string describing the unit of time in which the final SCI calculation should be expressed, e.g. "1-min"

instance-type.description: Type of Cloud Instance name used in the cloud provider APIs

location.description: Geographic location of provider as string (for watt-time model it is provided as latitude and longitude, comma separated, in decimal degrees)

vendor.description: Name of the cloud service provider in the ccf model. Can be aws, gcp or azure

ram-alloc.description: refers to GB of memory allocated.

ram-util.description: refers to percentage of memory utilized.

thermal-design-power.description: thermal design power for a processor

total-embodied-emissions.description: total embodied emissions of some component

timestamp.description: refers to the time of occurrence of the input
